\subsubsection{\-Function \-Documentation}
\hypertarget{vpx__image_8h_ab80398f28ca880368a922fa979eb66c1}{
\index{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h@{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h}!vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc@{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc}}
\index{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc@{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc}!vpx_image.h@{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h}}
\paragraph[{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf vpx\-\_\-image\-\_\-t}$\ast$ vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-alloc (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf vpx\-\_\-image\-\_\-t} $\ast$}]{img, }
\item[{{\bf vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-fmt\-\_\-t}}]{fmt, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{d\-\_\-w, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{d\-\_\-h, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{align}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}
\label{vpx__image_8h_ab80398f28ca880368a922fa979eb66c1}


\-Open a descriptor, allocating storage for the underlying image. 

\-Returns a descriptor for storing an image of the given format. \-The storage for the descriptor is allocated on the heap.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em img} & \-Pointer to storage for descriptor. \-If this parameter is \-N\-U\-L\-L, the storage for the descriptor will be allocated on the heap. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em fmt} & \-Format for the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em d\-\_\-w} & \-Width of the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em d\-\_\-h} & \-Height of the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em align} & \-Alignment, in bytes, of the image buffer and each row in the image(stride).\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{\-Returns}
\-Returns a pointer to the initialized image descriptor. \-If the img parameter is non-\/null, the value of the img parameter will be returned. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\hypertarget{vpx__image_8h_afaf35f1f2f2f634de394faf7d6aeeeb9}{
\index{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h@{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h}!vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap@{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap}}
\index{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap@{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap}!vpx_image.h@{vpx\-\_\-image.\-h}}
\paragraph[{vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}{\bf vpx\-\_\-image\-\_\-t}$\ast$ vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-wrap (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{{\bf vpx\-\_\-image\-\_\-t} $\ast$}]{img, }
\item[{{\bf vpx\-\_\-img\-\_\-fmt\-\_\-t}}]{fmt, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{d\-\_\-w, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{d\-\_\-h, }
\item[{unsigned int}]{align, }
\item[{unsigned char $\ast$}]{img\-\_\-data}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}
\label{vpx__image_8h_afaf35f1f2f2f634de394faf7d6aeeeb9}


\-Open a descriptor, using existing storage for the underlying image. 

\-Returns a descriptor for storing an image of the given format. \-The storage for descriptor has been allocated elsewhere, and a descriptor is desired to \char`\"{}wrap\char`\"{} that storage.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em img} & \-Pointer to storage for descriptor. \-If this parameter is \-N\-U\-L\-L, the storage for the descriptor will be allocated on the heap. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em fmt} & \-Format for the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em d\-\_\-w} & \-Width of the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em d\-\_\-h} & \-Height of the image \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em align} & \-Alignment, in bytes, of each row in the image. \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em img\-\_\-data} & \-Storage to use for the image\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{\-Returns}
\-Returns a pointer to the initialized image descriptor. \-If the img parameter is non-\/null, the value of the img parameter will be returned. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

\-Set the rectangle identifying the displayed portion of the image. 

\-Updates the displayed rectangle (aka viewport) on the image surface to match the specified coordinates and size.


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{\-Parameters}
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em img} & \-Image descriptor \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em x} & leftmost column \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em y} & topmost row \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em w} & width \\
\hline
\mbox{\tt in}  & {\em h} & height\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{\-Returns}
0 if the requested rectangle is valid, nonzero otherwise. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
